name: Stephen Poserina
summary: Strategic and innovative Senior Full Stack Engineer with 17+ years of experience designing and deploying enterprise-grade applications using Node.js, NestJS, and Python (FastAPI, Django). Adept at integrating AI/ML models, cloud-native microservices, and CI/CD automation pipelines that drive measurable business outcomes. Skilled in leading Agile, cross-functional teams, optimizing performance across distributed architectures, and delivering resilient, scalable, and secure digital ecosystems. Combines technical depth with a product-driven mindset to bridge backend intelligence with cutting-edge frontend experiences using React, Next.js, Angular, and Vue.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
details: Architected and developed microservices using Node.js and NestJS, integrating event-driven workflows via RabbitMQ and gRPC, achieving 40% faster inter-service communication and improving overall scalability.
Integrated AI-based analytics pipelines using Python (FastAPI, scikit-learn, TensorFlow) to predict IoT sensor anomalies, reducing false-positive alerts by 38%.
Migrated core infrastructure to AWS (ECS, Lambda, S3, RDS, CloudFormation), improving deployment speed by 55% and enabling full Infrastructure-as-Code automation.
Spearheaded the adoption of CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions and Docker, achieving 95% deployment reliability and reducing manual deployment time by 70%.
Led a cross-functional Agile team of 7 developers, conducting sprint planning, code reviews, and architectural reviews, improving delivery velocity by 25%.
Engineered real-time dashboards using React and Next.js, connected to WebSocket APIs for dynamic IoT data visualization with <200ms latency.
Designed automated monitoring using Prometheus and Grafana, improving system uptime to 99.98% and establishing predictive alerting for key infrastructure metrics.
Collaborated with data science teams to operationalize ML models through RESTful and GraphQL APIs, ensuring seamless integration with frontend clients and external partner systems.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
details: Built a distributed logistics management platform leveraging Node.js (Express, NestJS) and Python microservices, processing millions of shipment events daily with high throughput and fault tolerance.
Implemented predictive analytics models for route optimization using Python (Pandas, NumPy, TensorFlow), cutting average delivery delays by 24%.
Modernized legacy PHP and .NET components into containerized Node-based microservices deployed on AWS ECS and orchestrated through Terraform.
Developed a React.js and Angular hybrid frontend, integrating WebSocket-based notifications for real-time shipment tracking and ETA updates.
Automated system integration testing using PyTest, Jest, and Postman, reducing QA time by 45% and improving release stability across microservice boundaries.
Optimized SQL and NoSQL (MongoDB, PostgreSQL) queries, improving report generation and analytics API performance by 60%.
Created CI/CD workflows with Jenkins and Docker, enforcing automated linting, testing, and versioned releases.
Mentored junior engineers in Agile and DevOps best practices, ensuring consistent code quality and technical excellence across teams.

experience.title: Software Engineer
details: Designed scalable backend services using Python (Django, Flask) and early Node.js, supporting millions of user sessions across Google internal analytics tools.
Contributed to the migration of legacy Java and Python systems into containerized Node-based APIs, pioneering hybrid service patterns before Kubernetes adoption.
Enhanced data processing pipelines with BigQuery, Dataflow, and Pub/Sub, reducing ETL execution time from hours to minutes.
Developed an internal AngularJS-based frontend (2012+) for visualizing performance metrics, allowing real-time insights for engineering and product teams.
Collaborated with AI research teams to integrate machine learning models (TensorFlow prototype, 2013) into production-grade REST APIs for user behavior analysis.
Drove automation initiatives that replaced 70% of manual data collection through Python scripting and scheduled Airflow DAGs.
Actively participated in Agile sprint ceremonies and architecture design reviews, influencing long-term technical roadmaps across data-driven applications.
Supported code reviews, refactoring, and API standardization across backend services, improving maintainability and scalability for cross-team integrations.
